title: Adapting
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><ellipse cx='60' cy='48' rx='10' ry='13' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M60 61 Q70 80 90 90' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/><path d='M60 61 Q50 80 30 90' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4' fill='none'/><rect x='55' y='61' width='10' height='22' rx='5' fill='#fff' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2' transform='rotate(30 60 72)'/><circle cx='60' cy='40' r='7' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I adapt to what's happening now?
desc: Lives in the moment and discovers the future one choice at a time; expects and enjoys detours. Flexible, adjusts easily to change.

title: Believing
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='48' r='13' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><ellipse cx='60' cy='80' rx='18' ry='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><path d='M60 80 Q62 75 68 75 Q74 75 74 80 Q74 85 68 85 Q62 85 60 80 Z' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M60 80 Q58 75 52 75 Q46 75 46 80 Q46 85 52 85 Q58 85 60 80 Z' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M60 60 Q65 65 70 60' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M60 60 Q55 65 50 60' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M60 80 Q60 90 70 95 Q80 100 80 90 Q80 80 70 85 Q60 90 60 80 Z' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>
question: Does this mesh with my beliefs?
desc: High ethics guides behavior, people know where this person stands. Makes decisions based on values.

title: Collecting
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='48' r='13' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><rect x='54' y='61' width='12' height='18' rx='5' fill='#fff' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='50' cy='85' r='4' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='66' y='82' width='8' height='8' rx='2' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><ellipse cx='75' cy='70' rx='3' ry='5' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M60 61 Q50 75 45 90' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><path d='M60 61 Q70 75 75 90' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g></svg>
question: What am I interested in here?
desc: Collects information, things, quotes, artifacts, or facts - anything that is deemed interesting. The world is exciting because of its variety; acquiring, compiling, and filing stuff away keeps things fresh.

title: Connection
shadow: Enmeshed in too many ideas or people
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><path d='M38 60 h12 a4 4 0 0 1 4 4 v8 a4 4 0 0 0 4 4 h8 a4 4 0 0 1 4 4 v12' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><circle cx='54' cy='72' r='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='32' y='54' width='16' height='16' rx='4' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M82 60 h-12 a4 4 0 0 0-4 4 v8 a4 4 0 0 1-4 4 h-8 a4 4 0 0 0-4 4 v12' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4'/><circle cx='66' cy='72' r='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='72' y='54' width='16' height='16' rx='4' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>
question: How is this part of something larger?
desc: Loves to connect people and/or ideas; sees the relationship between things and/or people; perceives how one thing is part of something larger.

title: Creating Intimacy
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='40' cy='70' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='80' cy='70' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M40 80 Q50 90 60 80 Q70 90 80 80' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g></svg>
question: How can I be closer and more genuine with the people I already know?
desc: Comfortable with intimacy; encourages deepening of relationships; 'the more that is shared together, the more that is risked together.' May have a challenge meeting new people.

title: Enrolling
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><path d='M35 80 Q40 75 45 80 Q50 85 55 80 Q60 75 65 80 Q70 85 75 80 Q80 75 85 80' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4' fill='none' /><path d='M40 75 Q45 70 50 75 Q55 80 60 75 Q65 70 70 75 Q75 80 80 75' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4' fill='none' /><path d='M50 70 Q55 65 60 70 Q65 75 70 70' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='4' fill='none' /><rect x='38' y='78' width='44' height='10' rx='4' fill='#fff' opacity='0.12'/></g></svg>
question: How can I relate to this new person?
desc: Enjoys challenge of meeting new people and getting in their good graces; enjoys developing rapport, breaking the ice, making a new connection, then moving on.

title: Equalizing
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='40' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='80' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='30' y='90' width='20' height='6' rx='2' fill='#fff'/><rect x='70' y='90' width='20' height='6' rx='2' fill='#fff'/><rect x='50' y='70' width='20' height='6' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: Is everyone being treated fairly?
desc: Needs balance and to know that people are being treated in the same way; turned off by individualism; feels a need for a consistent environment of clear rules, where people will all know what's expected.

title: Feeling for Others
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='65' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 75 v15' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 75 l-10 10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 75 l10 10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='4' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What are people feeling now?
desc: Senses emotions in those nearby; shares their perspective in order to understand their choices; hears the unvoiced questions; anticipates others' needs.

title: Fixing It
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='8' rx='2' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 68 l10 20' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='6' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: What's the solution to this problem?
desc: Energized by breakdowns; loves to identify what's wrong, repair it or prevent it; watches for what might go wrong and avert it, enjoys rescuing and saving something.

title: Focusing
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='18' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='52' y='62' width='16' height='16' rx='4' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='4' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What's the point here?
desc: Capacity to concentrate on a goal for a long period of time. May need clear destination or will get frustrated; able to filter out distractions; keeps people on point and off tangents.

title: Get to Action
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='40' y='70' width='40' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><polygon points='80,75 100,80 80,85' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What can I do right now?
desc: Impatient for action rather than contemplation. Must make something happen.

title: Goal-Setting
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><path d='M40 90 L60 60 L80 90' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='6' fill='#fff'/><rect x='55' y='90' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What can I accomplish today?
desc: Has daily drive to accomplish something and meet a goal. Every day starts at zero and must achieve something tangible. There is a perpetual whisper of discontent.

title: Having Confidence
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='70' width='10' height='20' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><path d='M60 60 l10 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 60 l-10 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: What, me worry?
desc: Knows he or she is able to deliver, self-assured; no one can tell this person what to think. Alone has the authority to come to conclusions.

title: Humor
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='45' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='75' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M45 75 Q60 90 75 75' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g></svg>
question: What is amusing about this?
desc: Enjoys seeing the humor in situations. Can lighten tense moments and puts self and others at ease with laughter.

title: Including
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='40' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='80' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='30' y='90' width='20' height='6' rx='2' fill='#fff'/><rect x='70' y='90' width='20' height='6' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I stretch the circle wider?
desc: Desires to make others part of the group so as many as possible can feel its support; no one should be on the outside looking in; accepting, nonjudgmental.

title: Innovation
shadow: There must be a new way!
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='3' fill='#fff'/><path d='M60 70 l-15 15' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 70 l15 15' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 70 l0 -20' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: How can this be done differently?
desc: Loves to create new processes or products; easily bored with routine. Energized by never having done it before.

title: Love of Learning
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='40' y='80' width='40' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='55' y='50' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What can I learn next?
desc: Drawn always to the process more than the content of learning; energized by the journey from ignorance to competence. The outcome is less important than what is learned.

title: Loving Ideas
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='50' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='70' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What's a thrilling idea or theory to explain this?
desc: Searches for concepts to explain things; loves theories; derives lots of energy from a new idea.

title: Making Order
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='40' y='80' width='40' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I align all these different variables?
desc: Enjoys managing and aligning many variables into the best configuration. Jumps into confusion and devises new options; organizes what's messy.

title: Mentoring
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='50' y='80' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='55' y='60' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: What can help others grow?
desc: Sees potential in others; every person is a work in progress; goal is to help others achieve success; searches for signs of growth in others.

title: Optimism
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='45' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='75' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 60 l0 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 60 l10 10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 60 l-10 10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: What's right about this?
desc: Generous with praise; always on the lookout for the positive; contagiously enthusiastic; finds a way to lighten people's spirits. The glass is always half full.

title: Particularize
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><ellipse cx='60' cy='70' rx='12' ry='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 62 v16' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><ellipse cx='60' cy='70' rx='4' ry='2' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>
question: How is each of us unique?
desc: Intrigued by unique qualities of each person; observes each person's style and how it changes and builds relationships; keen observer and developer of others' talents and strengths.

title: Peacemaking
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke='#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='18' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 52 v36' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 70 l-12 12' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 70 l12 12' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: Where is the common ground?
desc: Looks for areas of agreement; holds conflicts to a minimum; prefers to search for consensus; will modify own direction in service of harmony.

title: Precision
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='80' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I order this chaos?
desc: The world needs to be predictable; imposes structure, sets up routines, timelines, and deadlines; needs to feel in control; dislikes surprises; impatient with errors. Control is a way of maintaining progress and productivity.

title: Reliability
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='50' y='70' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='55' y='80' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I do this right?
desc: Excuses and rationalizations are not acceptable; has to take responsibility for anything affecting commitment to reputation for conscientiousness and dependability. Easily frustrated by what is perceived as others' irresponsibility.

title: Seeking Excellence
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 70 l0 10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: How can this be excellent?
desc: Excellence and efficiency are the measure—doing the best with the least. Everything—the people, processes, products—is judged by how to make it better.

title: Standing Out
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='45' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='75' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M60 60 l0 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: How can I be recognized?
desc: Wants to be known for making a difference and be admired for credibility, success. Highly motivated toward rewards and recognition programs.

title: Storytelling
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='80' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/><circle cx='60' cy='70' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: How can I bring these ideas to life with a story?
desc: Needs to explain by painting vivid pictures until others are inspired to act.

title: Strategy
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='40' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='80' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><path d='M40 80 Q60 40 80 80' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g></svg>
question: What are alternative scenarios, and what is the best route?
desc: Sorts through clutter; recognizes all the possible options; engages in 'if this, then that' thinking.

title: Taking Charge
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='45' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='75' cy='80' r='8' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='70' width='10' height='20' rx='3' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: How can I get others aligned with me?
desc: Likes to be the boss; restless unless sharing opinions. Uses confrontation if necessary and naturally directs others into action.

title: Thinking Ahead
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='40' y='80' width='40' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><path d='M60 60 l0 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: Wouldn't it be great if...?
desc: Fascinated by the future. Describes a detailed future that pulls him or her forward; needs to inspire others in the dream; cherishes visions that energize and give hope.

title: Thinking Alone
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='70' width='10' height='20' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><ellipse cx='60' cy='90' rx='8' ry='4' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>
question: What can I think about now?
desc: Poses questions to self and tries to figure them out; constant mental hum; needs to be alone to think to come up with an answer; dislikes being put on the spot to respond.

title: Thinking Back
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='40' y='80' width='40' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><path d='M60 60 l-10 -10' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: How is the past a blueprint for the present?
desc: Looks back to understand the present and future; the present alone is confusing. May have trouble getting oriented to the new, and needs to understand the context of something in order to move forward.

title: Thinking Logically
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='60' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><ellipse cx='60' cy='70' rx='8' ry='6' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/></g></svg>
question: Why is this true? Prove it to me.
desc: Dispassionate; theories must be sound, logical, based on solid data. Exposes clumsy thinking; sees patterns in data.

title: Wanting to Win
icon: <svg viewBox='0 0 120 120' width='100' height='100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><polygon points='60,10 110,40 110,100 60,130 10,100 10,40' fill='#111' stroke:'#111' stroke-width='2'/><g><rect x='50' y='80' width='20' height='10' rx='3' fill='#fff'/><circle cx='60' cy='60' r='10' fill='none' stroke='#fff' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='55' y='70' width='10' height='10' rx='2' fill='#fff'/></g></svg>
question: Am I better at this than everyone else is?
desc: Compares performance to that of others; likes measurement to facilitate comparison; competition is invigorating.
